attributes.action: stop M P's  allowances for second homes when their main homes are within reasonable distance of Westminster and to curb some of the present allowances for all other MP's. Also an independent panel needs to be set up to monitor all expenses claimed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An independent panel needs to be set up to monitor all expenses claimed by MP's and stop the paying to allowances for second homes when MP's main homes are withing reasonable distance of Westminster and to curb the present allowances of other MP's.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
